ChunkText: if you left an employer, add last day you worked. do not delete any entries! if you work for one employer but are contracted to another: enter the name of the company that has legally hired you.
ContextBefore: students are required to work a combined total of at least 20 hoursweek across multiple employers during opt. if you are working with multiple employers, submit an entry for each one in the sevp portal and select part time or full time. do not delete any employers, unless it was entered in error and you did not work there.
ContextAfter: enter the address of the office where you physically go to work each day, even if it is different than the address of the hiring company.
